name: Jinbe
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
text: On Play: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {The Seven Warlords of the Sea} type card other than [Jinbe] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. When Attacking: Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 1 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

effect.text: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {The Seven Warlords of the Sea} type card other than [Jinbe] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 1 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.
